item.description: SINGLES WALK and LUNCH. Meet at Farmington Canal in Cheshire at 11 am for a lovely walk. See the old gate locks that were used to raise and lower the level of the water. This is a lovely area and a great place to spend a winter afternoon. Afterward, we?ll go nearby for a delightful lunch. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: Rt. 84W Exit 29 (left exit, Rt. 10 Milldale), end of ramp turn right onto Rt. 10S, go 5.5 miles (thru Cheshire center), turn right onto Cornwall Avenue (Wachovia Bank on right corner), continue 3/4 miles to 2nd stop sign, go straight, parking on right, path on left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing by my red Sebring convertible in the parking lot.
item.why: It will be a great way to be with other singles and take a walk on a Sunday morning.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
